title: The Beast in the Bedchamber
description: A goddess, disguised as a cat, chooses a man to be her slave...A girl is sold into marriage to pay off her father's debts, but her husband is nothing like she could have expected...A man is cursed to wander for eternity unless he finds true love -- and he must do it as a dog...The Beast in the Bedchamber features seven modern fairy tales about fantastic -- and often ill-fated -- romance. Included in these pages are selkies, werewolves, Egyptian goddesses and artists with murderous intent. The seven tales range from Gothic to modern, horror to comedy, encompassing everything from Bluebeard to Sleeping Beauty.
author: T.L. Bodine
